name: Godfather
description: You can't be killed at night. If there is a Mafioso he will attack the target instead of you. You will appear to be a Town member to the Sheriff. You can talk with the other Mafia at night.

name: Mafia
description: You can kill if the Godfather doesn't give you orders. If the Godfather dies you will become the next Godfather. You can talk with the other Mafia at night.

name: Assassin
description: Assassin is a member of the mafia group who wakes up every night with the mafia team, she is able to shoot independently from the mafia's arrow once during the game.

name: Bomber
description: The Bomber is mostly used in setups where the mafia must assign their nightkill to be carried out by a specific member of their team, making that person vulnerable to a Bomb. If the mafia nightkill is not assigned to any specific player, then sometimes the host will randomly choose a member of the mafia team to die, if they use their nightkill on the Bomb.

name: Saboteur
description: The saboteur is a member of the mafia group who wakes up every night with the mafia team and chooses one person, if the chosen person is a sniper, if the sniper shoots in the same night, his bullet will hit himself, if the chosen person is a gunsmith gun if he shoots the next day, his arrow will hit himself.

name: Consort
description: Distraction blocks your target from using their role's night ability. If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left you will become a Mafioso. You can talk with the other Mafia at night.

name: Consigliere
description: If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left you will become a Mafioso. You can talk with the other Mafia at night.

name: Spy
description: Spy is a member of the mafia team, who wakes up with the mafia on the night of introduction, during the game, he wakes up after all the players during the game and chooses one person, then the master informs him what the desired person will go to this night. Someone is gone. Also, on even nights, he wakes up with the mafia.

name: Framer
description: If your target is investigated they will appear to be a member of the Mafia. If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left you will become a Mafioso. You can talk with the other Mafia at night.

name: Janitor
description: If your target dies their role and last will won't be revealed to the town. Only you will see the cleaned targets role and last will. You may only perform 3 cleanings. If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left you will become a Mafioso.

name: Mistress
description: The mistress is a member of the mafia group, if killed, the mafia team will be able to fire two shots at the same time the next night.

name: Silencer
description: Blackmailed targets can not talk during the day. If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left you will become a Mafioso. You can talk with the other Mafia at night.

name: Terrorist
description: The terrorist is a member of the mafia team, but he does not wake up at night. The terrorist can announce to the master at any moment of the day that he wants to leave the game with one of the players (or in other words, blow himself up with another player) after This action, if the person chosen by the terrorist is a simple citizen, senior citizen, or godfather, he will survive and the terrorist will leave the game alone, otherwise both players will leave the game.

name: Lawyer
description: Lawyer is a member of the mafia team who wakes up independently in the night phase and selects a person, the inquiry of the selected person is negative in this night, also the lawyer can decide whether to vote for the selected person on the next day or not. .
